SummaryEnglish: Muon Sorata is an ordinary college student, however, there is a big secret under him. He is actually a mysterious thief named "MOUSE". He is elegant, wealthy, powerful and influential. After all, he steals everything he sets his mind to. He has three beautiful subordinates (slave girls). Momozona Mei, a computer science and physics expert; Kuribayashi Yaoi, an expert in chemistry; and Kakio Hazuki, an agile fighter, good at combat and sports. And there is nothing that cannot be stolen by "MOUSE".

1.SummaryEnglish: For four hundred years, a family of thieves has plagued the world with a series of handicraft thefts. Under the motto of there is nothing you cannot steal, no matter the risk, now, under the name of MØUSE, which has passed from generation to generation, it is the turn of the twelfth successor: Muon Sorata to continue with the family trade together with the help of his three beautiful apprentices.

2.TitleEnglish: Steal:02 There is Nothing that Mouse Cannot Steal
2.SummaryEnglish: They challenge MØUSE to rob the Odaiba tower, he accepts the challenge.

3.TitleEnglish: Steal:03 She Will Not Accept Destiny

4.TitleEnglish: Steal:04 Mouse Will Not Abandon a Comrade
4.SummaryEnglish: Muon has a date with Machiko before stealing the Tear from Muse.

5.SummaryEnglish: Hatsuki tries a new machine created to erase memory, but it fails and leaves his consciousness inside the computer.

6.SummaryEnglish: MØUSE enters the computer to "steal" Hatsuki, there he meets various Hatsuki personalities.

7.TitleEnglish: Steal:07 A Female University Student that Hates Men
7.SummaryEnglish: Tell the story before Yayoi joined the MØUSE team.

8.SummaryEnglish: Yayoi's story continues, the events that finally make her want to be part of the MØUSE team are detailed.

9.SummaryEnglish: Housu is an organization that is in charge of protecting objects of cultural value, so they send Wang to arrest MØUSE

10.SummaryEnglish: MØUSE is about to steal the Celestial Clock, this time the security measures are greater than ever.

11.SummaryEnglish: Wang has MØUSE cornered, he manages to turn the tables but Wang has one more hostage left.

12.TitleEnglish: Steal:12 Mouse's Dreams Will Never End
12.SummaryEnglish: Last chapter, everyone wants to please MØUSE.
